summary: An 18-year-old college freshman is seduced by a handsome vampire lover who introduces her to a dark world of carnal desires.
cast: Martin Kemp|Alyssa Milano|Rebecca Ferratti|Glori Gold|Seana Ryan|Sabrina Allen|Harold Pruett|Jennifer Tilly|Rachel True|Jordan Ladd|Robbin Julien|Christopher Utesch|Charlotte Lewis|David Portlock|Gregg Vance|John Riedlinger|Ladd Vance|Lynn Philip Seibel
title: El abrazo del vampiro
